strings.string: If GPS is not available, you may enter any position here, to simulate the moon data.
Enable or disable the simulation of GPS-position
Simulated latitude value as float (northern hemisphere: positive, southern hemisphere: negative)
Simulated longitude value as float (east meridian: positive, west meridian: negative)
Correction of time zone (-12 to 12, 0 = no correction)
Correction of daylight saving time (-1 to 1, 0 = no correction)

The watch is calculating the time zone and daylight saving time automatically by the set date and the GPS-position. If the calculation by the operating system is wrong, you may enter an relative time-offset in hours (e.g.: -2 will substract 2 hours from the actual time to display the moon data).
